bibl.title: Four Duke Papyri Concerning Pesouris, Basilikos Grammateus.
bibl.note: The Dossier. - Euphranôr, Stratêgos, and the Date. - Ptolemaios. - Consequences or Exakôn? - Topography. - Inv. 598. Herakleopolite, 21 August 138 B.C. - Inv. 602. Herakleopolite, 23 October 138 B.C. - Inv. 605 recto. Herakleopolite, 9 May 137 B.C. - Inv. 605 verso. Herakleopolite, on/after 9 May 137 B.C. - Inv. 599. Herakleopolite, 9 May 137 B.C.
SOSIN Joshua D. and John BAUSCHATZ, Four Duke Papyri Concerning Pesouris, Basilikos Grammateus.
